title: FedEx app testing what appears to be the ability to track shipments from other services
content:
Online shopping and, in turn, shipping have become more and more important in recent years, and tracking your shipments can be key to ensure things arrive safely. This week, major shipping service FedEx confirmed it is testing a new feature called “Crosstrack,” which hints at the ability to track shipments from other companies within its own app.

more…

The post FedEx app testing what appears to be the ability to track shipments from other services appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a leaked screenshot, FedEx is testing a new "Crosstrack" feature that might track shipments from other companies.
